Share.Title: Copy Link
Share.ShortHelp: Copies the URL of the Issue to the clipboard and allows you to share it with others.
Share.LongHelp: Please note that access to the Issue requires that your recipient has a 3DPassport, license and appropriate credentials.
3DMarkup.Title: New 3D Markup
3DMarkup.ShortHelp: Creates a markup linked to the loaded context by transitioning to 3D Markup. If an Issue is selected, the New Markup dialog will be launched automatically.
3DMarkup.LongHelp: In the Markup dialog box, enter a Title and Description for the markup.
CreateFromTemplate.Title: New Issue from Template
CreateFromTemplate.ShortHelp: Creates a new Issue based on a previously saved template.
CreateFromTemplate.LongHelp: Select a template from the dialog box to display the Create Issue dialog pre-filled with the selected template values. Enter any required attributes, and optionally add Contents, Members or Attachments. Click Start or Save as draft.
CreateFromBlank.Title: New Issue
CreateFromBlank.ShortHelp: Creates a new Issue starting with a blank form.
CreateFromBlank.LongHelp: In the dialog box, enter a title and any required attributes. You may optionally add Contents, Members or Attachments. Click Start or Save as draft.
Display.Title: Show/Hide Issues
Display.ShortHelp: Show/Hide issues marked on the object.
Inspect.Title: Inspect Issues
Inspect.ShortHelp: Opens the inspected view to show the selected issues and their related parts.
Focus.Title: Focused View
Focus.ShortHelp: Makes all objects without an associated issue transparent.
Open.Title: Open Content
Open.ShortHelp: Open content of the selected Issue.
AttachmentManager.Title: Attachments
AttachmentManager.ShortHelp: Opens the Attachment Manager for the selected issue.
AttachmentManager.LongHelp: Select an Issue to create, view and manage attachments
Mockup.Title: New 2D Markup
Mockup.ShortHelp: Creates an annotation attached to the selected Issue.
Mockup.LongHelp: Select an Issue to create a new 2D Markup. Use the drawing tools to create an annotation then click Save to attach the annotation to the selected Issue.
Templates.Title: Manage Templates
Templates.ShortHelp: Opens the Manage Templates dialog that allows you to create, edit, duplicate and delete Issue Templates.
Print.Title: Print
Print.ShortHelp: Prints the content of the viewer including selection highlight and loading boxes, to the printer of your choice
Reset.Title: Close
Reset.ShortHelp: Close all the objects from the view.
